speaker: prikhodkoalexey
text: Please rename your project VSCode implies that you are versus the code as a concept. I like the code and many people like the code too. I suggest ASCode as a new name. AS is an acronym for "alongside".

speaker: ivanpopelyshev
text: It will remind everyone about ActionScript: it had ints and uints, while JavaScript does not.

speaker: egamma
text:
Thanks for creating this issue. We think this issue is unactionable or unrelated to the goals of this project. Please follow our [issue reporting](https://aka.ms/vscodeissuereporting) guidelines.

Happy Coding!
